title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Improved search indexing failure handling by consolidating Slack alerts into a single aggregated message.
Added documentation for the GitHub Actions Runner Scale Set Client as a supported autoscaling solution.
Clarified SCIM setup requires the same app for both SAML and SCIM provisioning.
Introduced Dependabot alert metrics for tracking and prioritizing vulnerabilities.
Added third-party agents (Anthropic Claude, OpenAI Codex) to Copilot for task automation.
Noted upcoming deprecation of Copilot metrics endpoints and unavailability of Migrations REST API on GHEC with data residency.
Updated CLI custom instructions and added Copilot tutorial for project improvements.
Removed NVMe disk controller support claims for older GitHub Enterprise Server versions.
summary:
- Improved search indexing failure handling by consolidating Slack alerts into a single aggregated message.
- Added documentation for the GitHub Actions Runner Scale Set Client as a supported autoscaling solution.
- Clarified SCIM setup requires the same app for both SAML and SCIM provisioning.
- Introduced Dependabot alert metrics for tracking and prioritizing vulnerabilities.
- Added third-party agents (Anthropic Claude, OpenAI Codex) to Copilot for task automation.
- Noted upcoming deprecation of Copilot metrics endpoints and unavailability of Migrations REST API on GHEC with data residency.
- Updated CLI custom instructions and added Copilot tutorial for project improvements.
- Removed NVMe disk controller support claims for older GitHub Enterprise Server versions.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Improved search indexing failure handling by consolidating Slack alerts into a single aggregated message.
- Added documentation for the GitHub Actions Runner Scale Set Client as a supported autoscaling solution.
- Clarified SCIM setup requires the same app for both SAML and SCIM provisioning.
- Introduced Dependabot alert metrics for tracking and prioritizing vulnerabilities.
- Added third-party agents (Anthropic Claude, OpenAI Codex) to Copilot for task automation.
- Noted upcoming deprecation of Copilot metrics endpoints and unavailability of Migrations REST API on GHEC with data residency.
- Updated CLI custom instructions and added Copilot tutorial for project improvements.
- Removed NVMe disk controller support claims for older GitHub Enterprise Server versions.

### Title
Enhance search failure handling, add Copilot agents, update docs for runners, SCIM, Dependabot metrics, and REST APIs
